Articles.Content:
Hello together,

I should land on the biome "Duna's Craters".

But i don't find this. Does anyone know, where it is to be found?
Thank you very much!

Version: 1.2.2

I think they are the brown-colored biomes on this map:

https://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Duna#Biomes

Thanks for the help, first.

 

But i'm not sure, if they are the right biomes.

I'm with my spacecraft in a diagonal orbit and i always looks at the mission-windows, if the biome checkbox turn green, but it doesn't.
Normally, when the spacecraft ist over the right biome, the checkbox turns green and i know, i'm right.

Hm, now i'm very confused.

The checkbox does not turn green if you are supposed to be landed and you are not landed.

Do you have a good probe core on this craft? If you do, you can use KerbNet to tell you what biomes you are flying over.

If you are in a low orbit, you can EVA and do an EVA report, and that will also tell you what biome you are over. Similarly, a gravity experiment will also tell you.
